Summary: 2 star like objects low in the night one on top of each other.
divs: Sighting Detailsdriving with friend from gaithersgurg md to silver spring md noticed 2 star like objects one on top of each other in staight line.they were very bright, brighter than stars and alot lower.they didn't appear to move just hover.i told my friend and she said they were just stars,but she did say that they were very bright and lower than any stars shes seen.after a while she said that they had seem to move a little.this took her by surprised and then she stated she didnt know what they were.i had to be at work so i dont know how lond they were there for.funny thing is, the the objects came out again the following 2 nights, same place same formation.i went to the mufon site on nov. 30 2008 @ 0700 hrs and noticed that i am not the only person to see these 2 objects.something is happening in this area and id like to know what.tonight i will be out with camcorder in hand.i hope to catch images of this event.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Silver Spring
There were no other sightings in Silver Spring on or around November 28th 2008
